app.title: GitHub Commits Analytics Hub
app.description: Connect your GitHub repositories and leverage AI to analyze commit patterns, track development progress, and gain insights into your codebase evolution.
form.githubToken.label: GitHub Personal Access Token
form.githubToken.guide: Don't know how to generate a token? Check out this {link}.
form.chatgptToken.label: ChatGPT API Key
form.chatgptToken.guide: Don't know how to generate an API key? Check out this {link}.
popover.githubToken: Provide your GitHub Personal Access Token to allow the application to access your repositories and commit history.
popover.chatgptToken: Provide your ChatGPT API Key to enable AI-powered commit analysis and insights.
